install.name: Banner
install.author: Joomla! Project
install.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

param.name: cid
param.label: Banner client
param.description: Select banners only from a single client.

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: Select banners only from a single category.

param.name: tag_search
param.label: Search By Tags
param.description: Banner is selected by matching the banner tags to the current document keywords.

param.name: ordering
param.label: Randomise
param.description: Randomise the ordering of the banners

param.name: header_text
param.label: Header Text
param.description: A heading to display before the group of banners

param.name: footer_text
param.label: Footer Text
param.description: Text to display after the group of banners

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
